message.content:
I need to find the cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period from the financial statement.

Looking at the cash flow section of the statement, I can see there's a specific line item that shows this information:

```
| Cash and Cash Equivalents |  | 2024-02-02 |
| Beginning Balance  | 8000000.00 | 2024-02-02 |
```

This clearly indicates that the beginning balance of cash and cash equivalents was 8,000,000.00.

I can also verify this by looking at the balance sheet, which shows:
```
| Cash on Hand | 3000000.00 | 2023-12-31 | 2067352.98 | 2024-02-02 |
| Bank Deposits | 5000000.00 | 2023-12-31 | 3752082.80 | 2024-02-02 |
```

The sum of Cash on Hand (3,000,000.00) and Bank Deposits (5,000,000.00) at the initial date (2023-12-31) is 8,000,000.00, which confirms the beginning balance of cash and cash equivalents.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '8000000.00'} }
```
